SCTX:
Begin TGDiscountScript

float discount

set discount to CrimeGoldDiscount

MessageBox "1. Discount set to CrimeGoldDiscount %.0f" discount

SetPCCrimeLevel discount

MessageBox "2. PCCrimeLevel set to discount, discount should still be %.0f" discount

Player->RemoveItem Gold_001 GetPCCrimeLevel

Set discount to GetPCCrimeLevel

MessageBox "3. discount set back to new GetPCCrimeLevel, %.0f" discount

SetPCCrimeLevel 0

PayFine

StopScript TGDiscountScript

End TGDiscountScript
